          'rpart', 
          'rpart.tree')

pacman::p_load(pkgs, character.only = TRUE)

# otherwise output in PDF blurry

write_bib(c(.packages(), pkgs), 'packages.bib')

# fix remotes bib
bib <- readLines("packages.bib")
bib <- gsub("#readme", "", bib)
writeLines(bib, "packages.bib")
